mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.keyanlunwen_name as keyanlunwenName ,a.keyanlunwen_types as keyanlunwenTypes ,a.keyanlunwen_file as keyanlunwenFile ,a.keyanlunwen_content as keyanlunwenContent ,a.keyanlunwen_delete as keyanlunwenDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.keyanlunwen_yesno_types as keyanlunwenYesnoTypes ,a.keyanlunwen_yesno_text as keyanlunwenYesnoText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_uuid_number as jiaoshiUuidNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail
FROM keyanlunwen a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and a.keyanlunwen_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.keyanlunwenName},'%')
and a.keyanlunwen_types = #{params.keyanlunwenTypes}
and a.keyanlunwen_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.keyanlunwenContent},'%')
and a.keyanlunwen_delete >= #{params.keyanlunwenDeleteStart}
and a.keyanlunwen_delete <= #{params.keyanlunwenDeleteEnd}
and a.keyanlunwen_delete = #{params.keyanlunwenDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.keyanlunwen_yesno_types = #{params.keyanlunwenYesnoTypes}
and a.keyanlunwen_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.keyanlunwenYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
